item.description:
Spend the weekend in beautiful downtown Bar Harbor Maine and Acadia National Park in late autumn, the prettiest time of the year on Mt. Desert Island. The multi-colored leaves will still be falling and the days will be crisp and clear to hike & bike in Acadia National Park or kayak along the splendid coastline of Mt. Desert or on one of the calm inland island lakes.

Our accommodations for the weekend will be in luxurious rooms at the Bar Harbor Inn's Oceanfront Lodge located on the waterfront in the downtown area of Bar Harbor. The Oceanfront Lodge rooms are tastefully decorated in contemporary style and each have a private balcony overlooking the ocean.

View the Oceanfront Lodge Rooms

Bring your swimsuit as the Bar Harbor Inn has an outdoor heated pool & Hot Tub.

This Trip includes:


  • 2 Nights lodging at Bar Harbor Inn
  • Daily Continental Breakfast
  • Friday evening Wine & Cheese Social



Click Here for More Info. on this trip
item.how_to_find_us: Check-in at Bar Harbor Inn. Rooms are in the Overlook Building
item.name: Alfresco Adventures - Bar Harbor & Acadia Bike, Hike, Kayak Oct. 24-26
